title: Interpretation of a dream about walking in the forest in a dream

preview.html: A vision of walking in the forest in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether lost in the forest, I dreamed of walking in a green forest, I walk in a beautiful or scary forest, seeing forest animals for Ibn Sirin and more Walking in the forest in a dream is one of the dreams that haunts a large group of us, and it has many different connotations and connotations, which are interpreted according to the vision and details of the dreamer's situation in public life, as the forest is one of the beautiful things in our lives that many people want to visit and it contains many different green trees and plants, and forests have views full of joy and pleasure that many people feel when they see them, but the forest is found in few areas and not all over the world. Interpretation of a dream of walking in the forest in a dream Whoever sees in his dream that he is walking in the middle of a beautiful forest, among trees with dense branches and leaves, and in his dream he feels happy when he hears the sound of onions or the roar of water or the hum, in reality he enjoys amazing harmony in his life, whether on the professional, emotional or family level, and walking indicates a dream of a beautiful forest on a safe and straight path of life that It symbolizes unparalleled existential and psychological comfort. Interpretation of walking in the forest in a dream. Walking in the forest in a dream is evidence that you remember many long-lost friends. Walking happily in the forest is also a sign of change in different areas of your life. Being in the forest in a dream is evidence of the need to make many important decisions in your life to make changes. The forest in a dream also shows the good that the dreamer will receive in the near future. Seeing unmarried women walking in the forest indicates marriage to a person of good morals and love. Seeing tall trees in the forest is a sign of success and promotion at work. I dreamed that I was walking in a beautiful forest in a dream. As for the person who sees in his dream that he is walking in the middle of a beautiful forest, and this dream resulted in a feeling of happiness, joy and joy, and heard the sound of birds and onions chirping around him, this means that this person lives a quiet, beautiful and calm life on an emotional, private or professional level. Walking and walking in a beautiful forest indicates security, reassurance and psychological comfort. In today's article on our website, we explain to you the interpretation of seeing the forest in a dream, as interpreted by the famous interpreter Ibn Sirin, for all people And in its various forms. Interpretation of the forest in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing the forest in a dream is a sign of good and upcoming happiness for the dreamer. Seeing the forest with sunrise is a sign of good and new changes that are about to take place. Walking in the forest in a dream is evidence of remembering the past. Seeing the forest in a place other than your country indicates the desire to travel and positive changes in your life. title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake that always haunts me, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake that always chases me. Seeing animals in dreams has different meanings depending on the type of animal. Some of them have a good interpretation and others do not. So what is the interpretation of seeing a snake and is it good? Today through various we will find the interpretation of a dream about a snake that always chases me and what does it mean? What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a snake In a dream? I mean the interpretation of a dream about a snake that always follows me. Interpretation in a dream: If a person sees small snakes in a dream entering his house, this indicates the presence of many enemies in a person’s life. Whoever dreams in a dream that he killed a snake in his bed, this indicates the death of his wife, and God knows best. If A person sees in a dream that he brings a snake to his house, then this indicates the presence of an enemy in his life that he does not know. If a sick person dreams of a snake coming out of his house, this indicates worries and misfortunes in his life. If a person sees a snake in his house in a dream and is not afraid of it, this indicates The strength of that person. If a person sees in a dream that he raises snakes in his house, this indicates his high status in life. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for an unmarried woman? I mean the interpretation of a dream about a snake that always haunts me. For single women: If an unmarried woman sees a snake in a dream, This indicates her desire to get married. If a single woman dreams of a snake chasing her, this indicates a problem that may arise in her life. If a single woman dreams of a black snake chasing her, this indicates the presence of an enemy in her life. If an unmarried woman sees a white snake in a dream, this indicates her good character. If An unmarried woman saw in her dream that she was talking to a snake, so this indicates the presence of a malicious woman in their lives. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin? I mean Interpretation of a dream about a snake that always chases me. For a married woman: If a married woman sees a black snake in her house, this indicates On the corruption of her life. If a married woman sees a snake in her house in a dream, this indicates many problems in her life. If a married woman sees in a dream a black snake chasing her husband, this indicates problems in her wife’s work. If a married woman sees a snake coming out of the water in her house, this indicates The presence of many enemies in her life. If a married woman sees a snake in her stomach in a dream, this means that she is pregnant from a disobedient man, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a green snake in a dream, this indicates the presence of a man in her life who is far from her husband. If a married woman sees a yellow snake In a dream, this indicates illness and adversity in her life. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a pregnant woman? I mean the interpretation of a dream about a snake that always chases me. For pregnant women: If a pregnant woman dreams of a snake in her house and it kills her, this indicates the ease of her pregnancy, God willing. If the pregnant woman sees in her dream a yellow snake In her house and she killed him, this indicates that she will recover from the disease, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees a lot of snakes in a dream that her husband is killing her, this indicates her husband’s support.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a male child for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a male child in a single girl’s dream: An unmarried girl when she dreams that she is carrying a male child in a dream. A praiseworthy vision, because it shows that the dreamer will soon obtain many good things. The vision also indicates that the dreamer enjoys family stability with her family and feels very safe, by God. I know. As for the unmarried girl who sees herself walking in the street, she finds a male child and falls in love with him in a dream. The dream means that the dreamer has a beautiful fate, and the doors of happiness will open for her, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl who is pregnant and giving birth to a male child in a dream symbolizes that she is on the verge of A new and important stage in her life. This may indicate that he will get the job he wants and will have a bright future in it. Perhaps the vision indicates that the dreamer will get married soon and be happy with it, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl engaged to a young child in a dream is a good omen that her marriage contract is approaching. As for the appearance of a young boy in a dream for an unmarried girl, and she was crying in the dream. The dream indicates the psychological suffering that the dreamer feels alone, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream that I am breastfeeding a child who is not my son. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman. When she dreams of carrying a child in her arms in a dream, she feels fear for him and was very happy with him in the dream. The dream symbolizes the goodness that will triumph in the dreamer’s life soon, and God knows best. The dream also indicates insightful offspring, and God knows best. And in the event that a married woman sees that she is giving birth to a child. From another woman, and it was a gift in a dream. It is a good sign that this woman will receive a large inheritance from the woman who gave her the child, and God knows best. And when a married woman sees that her husband has given birth to a child from another woman, he marries him to her and she is sad and cries loudly in the air. A dream. A praiseworthy vision; Because it indicates that the dreamer’s husband will be promoted in his work, and his salary will increase, which will bring benefit and relief to his family, and God knows best. But if a young man appears crying or sad in a dream to a married woman in a dream. The vision shows that there are many differences between the mother and her husband that affect the psychology of their children, and they need To solve it, and God knows best. But if a married woman who is delaying childbearing dreams of seeing a male child smiling at her in a dream. This dream is a good omen for pregnancy, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a male child in a dream about the man and its meaning. The man who sees himself carrying an infant and was happy with him in The dream. This dream indicates that there is a big problem that the man was suffering from, but he will solve it soon, and God knows best. In the event that the man has accumulated debts, dreams that he dreams of a man and playing with him. This is good news for paying off the debt and making a profit in a short period, and God knows best. Seeing a male child in a dream For a man, it is a metaphor for a happy new life, and God knows best. The appearance of a smiling male child in a man’s dream is a symbol of promotion at work. It can indicate success and profits in trade. Either a man dreamed that he found a male child on the street, so he took him and hugged him in the dream. A sign of a great inheritance in mushy

title: Interpretation of being stabbed with a knife in a dream: seeing a knife in a dream

preview.html: An unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman dreams of a knife for a man, whether in the abdomen, back, heart, side, shoulder, or hand. I dreamed that I was stabbed in the stomach by Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a knife dream. Some may see in their dreams that someone is stabbing them with a knife, and this vision can cause panic and panic in the viewer, prompting him to search for an accurate interpretation of it. Through this topic, we present to you the signs of seeing knife stabs in the hand, foot, and more. Interpretation of stabbing with a knife in a dream: Stabbing with a knife is one of the disturbing and unsuspecting dreams, as it can bring indications of some disturbing events, whether for the dreamer or for his environment. The appearance of a knife in dreams can be A sign of insecurity, and there may be problems, both on an emotional level and in the family environment. Anyone who dreams that someone he knows stabs him in the neck indicates that someone you know may want to harm you. Seeing as if an unknown person has stabbed you with a knife, this indicates The presence in your environment of those who have bad intentions for you, while you are not paying attention. If you see a friend stabbing you in a dream, this may indicate a betrayal that you may face. If someone dreams of stabbing a familiar person, this indicates some intentions towards that person, and you may want to keep him away from Your way by any means possible. Stabbing someone in a dream can indicate fear of competitors, either emotionally or professionally. Dreams of being stabbed with a knife are not reassuring dreams, so it is necessary to pay attention to what these dreams may bring as signals that they will happen in reality. And if you are worried about A recent dream about a stab wound, so here are some interpretations below that may help you read the events of your dream. If you see a knife in your dream, this symbolizes that you feel insecure in reality about the problems you face at work, in your love life, or in the family. You do not have security and you live with caution and anxiety these days, and the appearance of a knife in a dream is only an indication of that. If you see that someone you know has stabbed you in a dream, this means that this person is hiding evil for you. If a stranger stabs you, this means that someone He is plotting against you without your knowledge. If you see in your dream that a friend has stabbed you, it means that this friend will betray you. If you see yourself stabbing someone, this symbolizes that you have intentions in your heart towards the person you stabbed or that you are seeking a job at work and you Ready to do whatever it takes to get everyone out of your way. If you see that you are stabbing a girl, this means that you fear failure in your romantic relationship and you are afraid of losing your life partner. Interpretation of stabbing with a knife in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees that she was stabbed in the heart in a dream, this indicates On the failure of the love relationship that was associated with her. - If an unmarried girl sees herself being stabbed in the back, this indicates that the people closest to her are deceiving her, which will leave a negative impact on her. If an unmarried girl sees herself being stabbed with a knife in her hand, this means that she is...

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about divorcing my wife?

preview.html: I dreamed that I was divorcing my wife. It is one of those disturbing dreams that some people have and then feel constrained because of their fear that their homes will be demolished and their family life destroyed. Therefore, they are considered obnoxious dreams, but according to translators it is a vision that brings good over evil, but this depends on the nature of the way in which the divorce took place and the reasons that led to it as well. Husband after divorce. I dreamed that I divorced my wife. I dreamed that I divorced my wife, so what is the interpretation of the dream? The interpretation of a dream about a husband divorcing his wife in principle indicates many good changes that will soon occur in his life and will change many of his affairs. But if he divorces his wife and is forced to do so, this It indicates that he feels a great deal of responsibility on his shoulders, but he sacrifices for the sake of his children and his wife and preserves his home. This vision also heralds him an upcoming promotion in which he will obtain an important position in the company in which he works and this will be a reason for him to achieve prosperity soon for all members of his family (God willing). It also expresses the wife obtaining some of her rights, achieving great success in her work, or obtaining a prestigious position that makes her feel valuable in life. However, if he fights a stranger and then divorces his wife, this means that he may be separated from his wife and family due to the multiple financial crises that he is exposed to. For her and his inability to save money. It also indicates the neglect of the husband of the house, his wife and his children, which may be a reason for increasing the gap between them and their estrangement in the future, so he must be careful and take more care of his family. What is the interpretation of a dream about a husband who divorced his wife from Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin interprets This vision primarily expresses the psychological state of the dreamer, but also some indications of a future full of events, some of which are pleasant. If the divorce occurred after a dispute, it is clear that he left a bad habit that he had followed for a long time. But if the wife was the one who requested Divorce, this indicates her feeling of anxiety and fear of admitting a serious mistake he committed and his fear of its consequences. It also expresses that the dreamer has reached the appropriate solution to that problem that has been bothering him for a long time and causing him trouble. It includes a unit on interpretation of dreams on the Egyptian website from Google. There are many interpretations and questions. About the followers that you can see. I dreamed that I divorced my wife while she was pregnant. The dream interpretation of a husband who divorces his wife while she is pregnant indicates conflicting thoughts at the time about some important issues related to his future and he was unable to make the appropriate decision regarding them. Also, this vision may indicate the fears that he feels By the husband, as he fears that he will not be able to fully bear the responsibility of a home, family, and children. But if it is the wife who wants divorce and separation, this is good news that she will give birth to a strong, handsome boy who will have support and help in the future (God willing). It also expresses imminent events. The occurrence will change many of the customs that the husband, his wife, and his family are accustomed to. As for the husband who sees that he is divorcing his wife with another woman, this indicates that his wife will give birth to a beautiful and tender girl. The most important interpretations of seeing a baby boy.

title: Interpretation of slaughtering a cow in a dream: Seeing slaughtering a cow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Slaughtering a cow for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether flogging, flogging, butchering, or butchering, slaughtering a fat calf, and cutting it according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a dream about a cow in a dream. Commentators said that there are different indicators of seeing cows in a dream and that the interpretation of the vision depends on the color of the cow. Sincerely, if a cow has long horns in a dream, the meaning is that it refers to a woman who is characterized by disobedience, so the cow stops him and turns away from him. Seeing him in a dream indicates creating livelihoods from crops and fruits. A black or yellow cow is a year dominated by joy and fertility, and cows It is in pain at the beginning of the year, and the balaka on its side is a tribulation in the middle of the year, and the balaka in its miracle is a tribulation at the end of the year, and fat cows are years of fertility, and thin cows are years of drought and infertility, and eating beef in a dream is a benefit from the lawful wealth of the year, and it is said That the cow is high, wealth and vitality. Fertile.Interpretation of slaughtering a cow in a dream. Slaughtering a cow in a dream is considered slaughter in some situations and disliked in other places, and commentators differed in the interpretation of this vision... as Khalil bin Shaheen Al-Zahiri says in his book Al-Isharat fi Al-Abrat Al-Imam Al. Whoever sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a cow on another altar, then the woman is making a mistake in herself. And money and its display... As for Muhammad Ibn Sirin, he described slaughtering in a dream as injustice and disobedience, and he mentioned in some interpretations that slaughtering a cow may indicate the death of a woman near the dreamer, especially if he sees it in the same dream. Its meat was spread raw on people. If they saw them eating from it, they would be tired and miserable in that year. If he gets some of that meat, then the dream here is considered praiseworthy, especially if he sees the meat cooked... It is stated in the Great Book of Interpretation of Dreams: It is unpleasant in the interpretation for the sleeper to see in his dream as if he is slaughtering a cow with a knife from its back, because such visions It expresses the dreamer's betrayal or someone's betrayal. He had trusted him with a matter or entrusted him with its secret. As stated in the same chapter: Slaughtering a cow from its scarf in a dream indicates an evil or heinous act committed by the dreamer. He is unfair to his wife. The summary of the interpretation: Every sacrifice in the dream is long, unless it is for food and feeding. As for slaughtering a cow, it is desirable if the dreamer sees himself eating some of its meat, on the condition that he grills the meat... Others hate baking it in a dream because it could indicate bad news and horrific events. Interpretation of seeing a cow slaughtered and eating its meat in a dream, but if one dreams that he slaughters a cow And eating the meat of that cow in a dream means that this person will get a lot of money from a beautiful woman. Interpretation of slaughtering a cow in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman dreams of slaughtering a cow in front of her and the slaughter scene is not bloody, then the vision in general is considered good, especially if The context of this scene was a celebration or happy occasion such as weddings and success. Parties and circumcision, or the scene expresses the celebration of Eid al-Adha or the person’s return from Umrah or Hajj. If a woman sees in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing blindness in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing blindness in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. The word blindness refers to the inability to see and the loss of the sense of sight from the eye, whether due to accidents, medical errors, congenital deformities, or other diseases, but when seeing the same sighted person becoming blind in a dream, it is among the matters Which causes fear and anxiety in the soul, so through this article we will review the symptoms of the most important interpretations provided by the great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Abdullah. - Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing blindness in a dream. Seeing a blind child in a dream refers to news that does not come that God will hear. Seeing the restoration of sight in a dream indicates recovery from diseases and overcoming seizures after blindness. Seeing sudden blindness in a dream indicates with the restoration of sight, little by little, The person with the vision will overcome crises and receive well soon. Blindness in a dream according to Imam Al-SadiqIt indicates poverty, lack of money, or the loss of a loved one. Cataracts in the eyeWhat causes blindness in a dream indicates the emergence of major problems. Being able to see again in a dream after blindness is a promising vision. It indicates good news and the fulfillment of desires. Seeing a relative becoming blind in a dream indicates that this person suffers from judgments and injustice towards himself. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surat Abs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing blindness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing blindness in a dream is an indication of deception. And deceit and evil. Seeing blindness in a dream is a warning to the dreamer against approaching God through obedience and good deeds. Blindness in a dream indicates anxiety, fear, and overthinking. Seeing blindness in a dream indicates a lack of worship and reading the Qur’an. Blindness in a dream indicates that another person near the dreamer has been injured. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone looking out the window in a dream. Interpretation of visual blindness in a dream for a single woman. Seeing blindness in a person’s dream is an indication that she is facing many challenges and crises that she must overcome in order to succeed and achieve her dreams. Seeing a close girl’s uncle in a dream indicates that this person is suffering from Confusion at this time and he has problems. Helping a blind person in one’s sleep says that he is a good and just person. Interpretation of seeing blindness in a dream for a married woman. Seeing blindness in a married woman’s dream denotes committing sins and transgressions, repenting, and returning to God. Seeing blindness in a married woman’s dream also suggests many problems and neglect of her home and needs. Her family. Seeing the return of sight in a dream after becoming blind indicates that he will overcome the crises and problems he is going through. As for seeing helping a blind person in a married woman’s dream? Connotation of good deeds and good deeds. Interpretation of seeing blindness in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing blindness in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates disagreements. Family crises in her life and the vision is a warning to watch her behavior. Restoring sight after sleep blindness in a pregnant woman is a sign of good news and omens entering her life. A

title: Interpretation of images in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of pictures in a dream for single people, pictures are part of the memories that we keep in their lives that show us memories of the past in small paintings or through a mobile phone and every picture that one can photograph is a situation or event that a person can go through, so the subconscious mind can store Some of these memories and events in stock are called feedback, and some of these images appear during a person’s sleep in the form of dreams, so in this article we will learn today about the interpretation of images in a dream for individuals. Interpretation of seeing images in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream an image placed in framework. This vision expresses the many relationships that this girl enters into and also indicates the failure of these relationships in the future. A single girl sees pictures of her old friends. This symbolizes the fulfillment of all her dreams and that she will achieve many achievements and progress at work. Interpretation of seeing my picture for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream is evidence that there are many people around her who are hypocritical and malicious, and they have hatred, envy, and intrigues for her and want to harm her. The only girl who She sees her picture placed high and far away, symbolizing that this girl will be able to achieve great success for herself at the academic level. If the girl sees in a dream her own picture. This symbolizes the sadness, depression and oppression this girl suffers from. It also expresses her exposure to injustice at a time in her life. Which had the worst effect on himself. Seeing a single girl sleeping in a picture of herself that was distinguished by her attractive appearance. This expresses that she will be blessed with many good and happy events that will remain forever in her life, and this vision also symbolizes the approaching courtship of a good man.Interpretation of seeing individual pictures in a dreamIf a girl sees in a dream that she is buying pictures. This dream symbolizes that this girl has many dreams and aspirations that she has not fulfilled or fulfilled.Seeing a girl in a dream breaks images. This symbolizes that she is following the wrong path in her life, but she will correct herself as quickly as possible, find the right path and improve her relationships with those around her. Interpretation of a vision of taking pictures for a single woman: If a single girl sees in her dream that she is taking a selfie from the front camera of the phone. This symbolizes the presence of many illusions in the girl’s life, and that she is immersed in these illusions, loves herself very much, and sees qualities and things in herself that she does not have, and that these illusionary things give her strength. If they are eliminated, they will be very weak. This vision also expresses the great internal psychological problems that this girl faces and that haunt her life and she cannot get rid of them in any way. Interpretation of seeing a dream about one photo album. Seeing a single girl in her dream sees many pictures and then puts them On her own album. This expresses the extent of respect and love that the girl feels for this photo. In conclusion, it is mentioned that all scholars’ interpretations of photos, photo albums, or taking individual or group photos, all of these

title: Interpretation of dreams and visions of blood in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams and visions of blood in a dream: When a person sees blood in a dream, it can cause him anxiety and panic, and therefore he searches for an interpretation of this dream, and sayings have multiplied regarding the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream, and in this article we will explain the interpretation of seeing blood in a dream. Follow us. Interpretation Seeing blood in a dream: There is no doubt that seeing blood in a dream is one of the negatives, as seeing blood in a dream indicates forbidden money or committing a sin, and it is also possible that it is a lie, and it can also be interpreted as pen ink, and the interpretation of the vision depends on the blood. In the dream according to the rest of the details that appear in the dream. Interpretation of seeing blood coming out of someone in a dream: The blood that comes out of a person is not benign because it expresses frustration. For example, when one sees in his dream that he was injured in a car accident and blood came out of it, this means that he will be disappointed and disillusioned in what he desires. On the other hand, if one sees in a dream that blood is coming out of his eyes, this is a warning to him about his bad morals, Watching the private lives of others, and interfering in matters that do not concern him. His spying on others around him, a father or a mother. But if he sees blood bleeding from his head, this means a person’s disobedience to the orders of his Lord and his bad behavior. It also expresses that the dreamer is exposed to many problems and difficulties in his life and that he will overcome them, God willing, because it expresses his dealings with With the dangerous conflicts that steal his happiness and sadden him, and it is necessary to seek help from a rational mind to overcome them. On the other hand, some interpretation scholars have interpreted that the blood that comes out of the head expresses a person’s desire to earn a lot of money through illegal means. Interpretation of seeing blood coming out of the vagina in Dream: There are many interpretations of seeing blood coming out of a woman’s vagina in a dream, as this represents the occurrence of a certain problem for the woman related to the postpartum period or menstruation. Interpretation of the woman who sees blood in a dream. There are many interpretations related to the woman who sees blood in her dream, and the interpretation varies according to the marital status. For that woman, and we will explain it below: A married woman sees blood in a dream. When a woman sees herself in a dream being hit with a spear and wounded with a wound flowing with blood, this means that this woman will be blessed with abundant money and a great treasure that she will enjoy. This treasure could be gold, money, peace of mind, or knowledge, and this treasure could be a good offspring or a good friend who pays for good. On the other hand, seeing blood in a dream represents changes and developments in the life of the dreamer, for example moving from One job to another is better for him, and if he is a merchant, it represents an expansion in trade and business, and it is also possible that it means moving from one residence to another. In addition, seeing blood in a dream can represent an increase in nutrition or an increase in fertility in a man and can represent an increase in emotional feelings in a woman. In addition, there is another interpretation for a woman seeing blood in a dream, which means

In addition, seeing blood in a dream can represent an increase in nutrition or an increase in fertility in a man and can represent an increase in emotional feelings in a woman. title: Interpretation of a dream about peace in a dream, shaking hands in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of peace in a dream. If you have had this dream before, seeing a handshake is one of the common and natural situations that we go through in our daily lives, either when we shake hands with close people such as friends or people. See for the first time in official interviews, for example, is the official symbol of the usual greeting in many countries of the world.Interpretation of peace and kissing in a dream; Because greeting is one of the things that people do when they meet to greet and shake hands, and the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, says: Spread peace among yourselves, and it also says: “Send greetings to those you know and to those you do not know.” Society, to express love, people kiss, greet and embrace, but what does this mean when one sees it in a dream. This is what we will learn today through the following article on the encyclopedia website, so follow us. Peace in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars have indicated that seeing a handshake in a dream has many different meanings, including that it expresses fulfillment of a covenant and honesty, and it is also an indication of a good relationship between the dreamer and the one with whom he shakes hands. It indicates Seeing relatives shaking hands with a familiar person in a dream indicates that the dreamer is always interested in asking about his relatives. If the dreamer sees himself shaking hands with a well-known sheikh in a dream, this is considered one of the dreams promising his marriage to a beautiful girl, and God knows best. In the case of greeting an unknown sheikh in a dream, this indicates However, the dreamer will escape from dangers in reality. If the dreamer is suffering from a financial crisis due to the accumulation of debts and sees in a dream that his insurance company is shaking hands with the creditor, then this is a good sign that the debt will be paid in reality. When the dreamer dreams that he is shaking hands with his colleagues in the profession, this promises him the promise of success. In his projects.Interpretation of seeing a handshake in a dream: If the dreamer is in reality known for his good condition and sees that he is shaking hands with a well-known person and performing many actions that are prohibited in reality, then the meaning of this dream lies in the guidance of this person because of the dreamer. If the dreamer sees that he is shaking hands with a person with whom he has enmity in reality, the interpretation of this lies in the end of this enmity in reality based on the enemy’s desire. If the dreamer sees that his partners refuse to shake hands with him in the dream, this indicates failure on the professional level and failure to achieve the desired goal of success. Seeing peace with someone who is at odds with the dreamer symbolizes the end of this conflict in reality. When the dreamer dreams that he shakes hands with many unknown people in a dream, this indicates the beginning of the formation of new relationships in his life. But if the dreamer suffers from a health condition in reality And he dreams of shaking hands with a doctor, as this is a sign of his recovery in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of greetings in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin showed that shaking hands in a dream indicates a strengthening of the relationship between him and the one he shakes hands with in reality. Ibn Sirin mentioned that this vision also expresses the benefit of the one who shakes hands with the dreamer in a dream. If the dreamer sees that he refuses to shake hands with someone in a dream, this means that he will have the opportunity to travel in reality. If you receive a deceased person in a dream, this
